name: twilight gallery: a quick dream analysis
name_original: twilight gallery: a quick dream analysis
description:
This is an interactive walkthrough of a dream I had, with an interpretation of the Jungian variety. Created for my intro to personality class. 

Use the WASD keys or arrow keys for movement.

Walk into white-colored items to view dialogue.

Use the space key to advance dialogue.

To progress through the gallery, follow the arrows.

Password to access is in the end of the game, or walkthrough video, to access this project. If you are reading this, you are probably free to share it privately, just with permission.

Made using the Bitsy engine, using provided music.

Source of Jungian terms: https://www.psychceu.com/jung/sharplexicon.html
